body:
I thought the existing code would work as:

 - The definition would not be compiled in since it is guarded by `__AVX__`
 - This symbol would resolve to null (since we're weak linking)
 - We'd do the right thing based on what `GetAvailableIntrinsics` returned

Is any of the steps above not working as intended?
